name: keycast
description: Keycast is a secure key management system for teams on Nostr.

scripts.start: bun run build:web && bun run dev
scripts.dev: DATABASE_URL=postgres://postgres:password@localhost/keycast RUST_LOG=debug,hyper=info,h2=info,rustls=info,sqlx=info,nostr_relay_pool=info MASTER_KEY_PATH=./master.key ENABLE_EXAMPLES=true ALLOWED_ORIGINS=http://localhost:3000 SERVER_NSEC=e870badb3c21ac7b6d7e9529b5214d39b270f96a7e1c6bb34d9ffab430d272a4 WEB_BUILD_DIR=./web/build cargo run --bin keycast
scripts.dev:watch: DATABASE_URL=postgres://postgres:password@localhost/keycast RUST_LOG=debug,hyper=info,h2=info,rustls=info,sqlx=info,nostr_relay_pool=info MASTER_KEY_PATH=./master.key ENABLE_EXAMPLES=true ALLOWED_ORIGINS=http://localhost:3000 SERVER_NSEC=e870badb3c21ac7b6d7e9529b5214d39b270f96a7e1c6bb34d9ffab430d272a4 WEB_BUILD_DIR=./web/build cargo watch -x "run --bin keycast"
scripts.check: cargo fmt --all -- --check && cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings -A deprecated && cargo test --workspace
